description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0548 ( Signatory's Relationship to Subject)
name: v2 Signatory's Relationship to Subject

text.div:
Signatory's Relationship to Subject

CodeDescriptionDeutsch (German)CommentVersion
1 Selfadded v2.5
2 ParentElternadded v2.5
3 Next of Kinadded v2.5
4 Durable Power of Attorney in Healthcare Affairsadded v2.5
5 Conservatoradded v2.5
6 Emergent Practitioner (practitioner judging case as emergency requiring care without a consent)added v2.5
7 Non-Emergent Practitioner (i.e. medical ethics committee)added v2.5
